Name: Dr. Mohammad Khalid, Civilian Complaint Review Board
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE COUNCIL OF DR. MOHAMMAD KHALID AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY CIVILIAN COMPLAINT REVIEW BOARD.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text:
RESOLVED, pursuant to Rule 10.60 of the Rules of the Council and Section 440 of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby approves the appointment of Dr. Mohammad Khalid, a resident of Staten Island, as a member of the New York Civilian Complaint Review Board to serve the remainder of a three-year term that expires on July 4, 2025.

COUPLED ON GO
